price: Wancan, da shi Muka yi musu sakamako sabõda kãfircinsu. Kuma lalle, bã Mu yi wa kõwa* irin wannan sakamako, fãce kafirai.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ
footnotes: * Allah na saka wa kãfirai gwargwadon aikinsu, kuma Yanã yin falala ga mũmini da kyautar da ta fi aikinsa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika jazaynāhum bimā kafarū wahal nujāzī illā al-kafūra
